job_description:
Key ResponsibilitiesAutomate data processing tasks and conduct statistical analyses using codeBuild data pipelines for extracting, transforming, and loading data into a central databaseConduct ad hoc research projects with electoral or campaign datasets and design data visualizations for non-technical audiencesRequired Qualifications and EducationExperience in data engineering tasks like data wrangling using SQLProficiency in statistical modeling using Python or RSkilled in data visualization techniques, including the use of Tableau or similar softwareAbility to conduct election forecasting or causal inference / field experimentsKnowledge of political science and electoral tactics

Last updated : 2024-03-17

Qualifications: Required Qualifications and EducationExperience in data engineering tasks like data wrangling using SQLProficiency in statistical modeling using Python or RSkilled in data visualization techniques, including the use of Tableau or similar software
Ability to conduct election forecasting or causal inference / field experiments
Knowledge of political science and electoral tactics
Responsibilities: Key ResponsibilitiesAutomate data processing tasks and conduct statistical analyses using code
Build data pipelines for extracting, transforming, and loading data into a central database
Conduct ad hoc research projects with electoral or campaign datasets and design data visualizations for non-technical audiences
